cause.title: Class Occupied
cause.p: We reserved the class, but when we entered, there was another class taking place.

step.cmd: First, be sure that the perty currently occupying the room is not simply running over on their appointment time. This will often be the case when there is a slight overlap on reservation times.

The app is in its initial development stages. This means that sometimes the system will have flaws, or not update in time to notify the user. In the event that you have reserved a time in the classroom, and someone else has the room occupied, the existing party takes precedent. If you are the party is not able to use the room, please contact our Support team. Their information can be found in the "Contact" page of our site.
